item.title: Travel to Mcleodganj
item.description: Project Requirements Visited Mcleodganj in Himachal Pradesh, India to learn about Tibetan culture in the town where Dalai Lama lives.

item.title: Simba's Photoshoot
item.description: Project Requirements Click pictures of my friend’s pet cat Simba.

item.title: Avengers-themed Newsletter
item.description: Project Requirements Required to write an innovative newsletter in storytelling format for AdPushup’s subscriber list.

item.title: Bernard Schlink’s The Reader: A Review
item.description: The Reader by Bernard Schlink is a necessary book. As I write this, it’s been 27,594 days since World War II ended.

item.title: South Park’s Butters is Eerily Similar to Bojack Horseman’s Todd. Here’s Why
item.description: It’s probably not fair to compare two different characters from shows that are very distinct from one another.

item.title: The NBA-China Dispute Summed Up: League Panders To China
item.description: To refrain from political commentary or not, that is the question.

item.title: Blog for DU Beat
item.description: Project Requirements Write a blog post for DU Beat, an independent student-run newspaper.

item.title: Reporting for The Hindu
item.description: Project Requirements Was required to work on Christmas Eve in Chennai and write press coverage article for a particular event which took place on that day.
